channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: I Wasn’t Sure I Wanted Anthropic to Pay Me for My Books—I Do Now
item.description: Anthropic agreed to a $1.5 billion settlement for authors whose books were used to train its AI model. As an author who fits that description, I’ve co...

item.title: Nissan Leaf 2026 Review: Superb Steering, Competitive Pricing
item.description: The groundbreaking Leaf returns bigger and better than ever—but leaves us wanting more.

item.title: Last day to amplify your brand: Host your Side Event at TechCrunch Disrupt 2025
item.description: The application to host a Side Event at TechCrunch Disrupt 2025 closes tonight at 11:59 p.m. PT. Boost your brand during Disrupt Week in October. Appl...

item.title: Microsoft slips unscathed through EU competition probe after promising to unbundle Teams
item.description: Microsoft will escape largely unscathed from a major antitrust investigation by the European Commission that could have resulted in billion-dollar fin...

item.title: We are entering a golden age of robotics startups — and not just because of AI
item.description: The robotics startup market has matured over the last decade and the cost to produce robots has gone down significantly.

item.title: Wi-Fi Router Vs Mesh System: Which Is Best for You?
item.description: Find out whether a single Wi-Fi router or a mesh system makes the most sense for your home network.

item.title: The Best Gifts for Newlyweds They’ll Actually Use (2025)
item.description: Whether you’re shopping for a couple or updating your own registry, these are our favorite tried-and-tested gifts that’ll be enjoyed for years to come...

item.title: Charlie Kirk Shooting Suspect Identified as 22-Year-Old Utah Man
item.description: Authorities have named Tyler Robinson as a suspect in the murder of right-wing influencer Charlie Kirk, citing Discord messages as evidence of his all...

item.title: Apple delays release of iPhone Air in China due to pending approval of eSIM
item.description: The eSIM-only iPhone Air's release is being delayed in China, likely due to regulatory issues around the approval of the embedded SIM.

item.title: How an over-the-air update made Quilt’s heat pumps more powerful
item.description: Quilt's software update unlocked an additional 20% heating and cooling capacity for all of its heat pumps, including those installed in customers' hom...
